mng: farmstead, village, manor, place of business, banker (in a gambling game), grave or solemn, holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

exm.mng: Xinzhuang or Hsinchuang city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Shijiazhuang prefecture level city and capital of Hebei Province 河北省[He2 bei3 Sheng3] in north China
Tai'erzhuang district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong
township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
